roleset.name: get, acquire
roleset.note: ACQUIRE-V NOTES: Based on big corpus, comparison with 'gain' and 'buy'. Member of Vncls obtain-13.5.2-1. (from acquire.01-v)
ACQUISITION-N NOTES: Roleset based on instances in nouns-lv task and acquire.01 roleset. Associated verb is member of Vncls obtain-13.5.2-1. (from acquisition.01-n)

example.text: New England Electric will acquire PS of New Hampshire.
Its Moleculon affiliate acquired Kalipharma Inc for $23 million.

example.name: Args 0, 1, 2, 3
example.text: The firm advises on the details of their acquisition of TPF's almond assets for $160 million from the Receivers and Managers group.
example.arg: from the Receivers and Managers group

example.name: Args 0, 1, 3
example.text: Not that I commend what he did; for he, perhaps, by his acquisition of money for Sparta, injured her more than Sulla injured Rome.
